scripts.postbuild: npm run cleancache && npm run cp2
scripts.postbuilduat: npm run cleancache && npm run cp2uat
scripts.cleancache: for f in ./dist/*.js; do mv "$f" "${f/.js/}.securejs"; done; sed -i '' 's/main-es2015\.js/main-es2015\.securejs?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/main-es5\.js/main-es5\.securejs?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/runtime-es2015\.js/runtime-es2015\.securejs?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/runtime-es5\.js/runtime-es5\.securejs?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/polyfills-es2015\.js/polyfills-es2015\.securejs/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/polyfills-es5\.js/polyfills-es5\.securejs/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/polyfills-nomodule-es5\.js/polyfills-nomodule-es5\.securejs/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/scripts\.js/scripts\.securejs?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html; sed -i '' 's/styles\.css/styles\.css?'$(echo $(date '+%s'))'/g' ./dist/index.html
